TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted but you fall under their weight

I wish my ice cream not to change colour without noticing me before doing so (weird one yup yup)

Granted. All ice cream becomes very, very hot.

I wish for people to convert to the one true faith of Shrekism.

Granted, but now everything is a part of his swamp, so GET OUT!

I wish for unlimited RAM for KSP to use.

Granted but you realize you ll never have enough room for them

i wish i can give better explains

Granted. You become the president immediately after using your newfound explanation skills. Then you're assassinated.

I wish to never tire of music.

Granted, you're locked in a room in which you cannot die and are forced to listen to horrible music until the end of time.

I wish for a wild modkip to appear.

Modkip uses ban! It was super effective!

I wish for a bagel.

Its filled with poison.

I whished i could win something... I always lose at sweepstakes... sadface

Granted, you win a free execution.

I wish for a renewed and improved Apollo program.

Granted. Apollo 1 and 13 are repeated ad infinitum.

I wish KSP had no bugs.

Granted! But that screws up the physics. and you can't abuse bugs anymore.

I wish I had a wish.

Granted: you wish for a private intergalactic ship - and you don't get it.

Hmm }:-) what if... I wish to die slowly and painfully.

Granted. Death by forced listening to Justing Bieber, 1D and Selena Gomez. All at the same time

I wish for Multiplayer.

Granted. The servers are populated by players from Halo and CoD.

I wish for pizza.

Granted. There's tons of the stuff at the bottom of your local landfill.

I wish to live in a Wile E. Coyote cartoon.

Granted: your role is an insignificant cactus in the background.

I wish for the schwartz to be with me.

Granted. Everyone else's schwartz is much bigger than yours.

I wish for unlimited data on my smartphone at a reasonable cost.

Granted - your currency suddenly became weaker then ever, and 104,044,194.99$ is now the most reasonable cost.

I wish to own a private fully functional Death Star.

Granted. Some farmboy drops a torpedo down the thermal exhaust port.

I wish I had a super villain lair.

Yes, but counter-terrorists rush your base very soon.

I wish for a pet kerbal.

Granted. But it eats you.

I wish that kerbals werent cannibals.

Granted. They now only eat czikens.

I wish there was a bigger LV-N in KSP.

Granted, but it kills all your kerbals because of radiation.

I wish I had faster internet.

granted bu you're no longer able to follow him

i wish i can sleep like most

Granted, but I have no idea what you just said, so nothing happens and you have used up your third and final wish.

*goes back into lamp*

I wish to know what it is like to be imperfect without experiencing it.
